title: Kopod – Tech Talks, Indonesian Voices
description: Kopod is Indonesia's tech podcast platform, featuring authentic conversations, stories, and insights from local creators, professionals, and startup founders. Discover technology, startups, and digital culture in a relatable, community-driven format—delivered in Bahasa Indonesia.
author: Treon Studio Team

ogImages.alt: Kopod – Indonesia's Tech Podcast: Real Stories, Real People, Real Impact.

twitter.title: Kopod – Tech Talks, Indonesian Voices
twitter.description: Discover authentic tech stories, startup journeys, and digital culture from Indonesia. Listen to Kopod for real voices and real impact in the Indonesian tech community.
